excerpt: DrawingML is the "new" XML language for all Microsoft Office graphics. Before DrawingML office graphics was stored in VML (with Office extensions). Before VML office graphics were stored in binary "Escher" format. * DrawingML can describe Shapes, Pictures, Diagrams and Charts. * DrawingML first appeared in ECMA-376:2006. * MS Word 2007 supports DrawingML in a "limited way".
